settings.content: FAQ: [Drop down menu](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942350-creating-a-dropdown-menu) | [Home Page Featured Links](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942377) | [Adding Tabs](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942364-adding-tabs) | [Sale Banners](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942366-products-on-sale) | [Related Products](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942378-related-products) | [Page of Collections](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1132818-page-of-collections) | [Content Page Video](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942365) | [Product Page Video](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1059911) | [Adding Columns](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1033987)
If you need any assistance, please contact [support@outofthesandbox.com](mailto:support@outofthesandbox.com)

settings.label: Featured content
settings.info: Displayed below the header on all pages

settings.content: Choose the order of your home page sections. The slideshow will always be displayed at the top of the home page.
For best results, upload images that are 1280px in width and under 600px in height. Try to keep your slideshow images the same size.
Show links to featured collections, products, pages, and blogs.
Show a collection of featured products in the standard column grid layout.
Feature a single product or collection of products in full detail to purchase directly from the home page.
Show recent blog articles on the home page.

settings.label: Number of product tag links
settings.info: The product tag filter will change from text links to a select box when this value is exceeded.

settings.label: Show quick view full product description
Shipping rates calculator default country selection

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: Show continue reading link for article excerpts
Show additional articles on article page
Show article banner image
settings.info: The article's featured image will be used as a full-width banner

settings.label: Enable [DISQUS](http://disqus.com/) comments (instead of Shopify's default comments)

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://docs.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).
Although you will be able to display prices on your storefront in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: To test this feature, set the number of days until the popup is displayed again to 0.

settings.label: Days until popup is displayed again
Show social media icons in header
Show social media icons in footer
